io.rouz.task.context

Class AsyncContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.rouz.task.context.AsyncContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TaskContext

    public class AsyncContext
extends Object
implements TaskContext
    A TaskContext that executes evaluation and Value computations on a given ExecutorService. Override evaluate(Task) to implement Value memoization.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.rouz.task.TaskContext

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static TaskContext create(ExecutorService executor)

      • evaluate

        public <T> TaskContext.Value<T> evaluate(Task<T> task)
        Description copied from interface: TaskContext
        The entry point for evaluating a TaskContext.Value from a Task. All upstreams to the task will also be evaluated through this same method. The implementation should define how and where evaluation happens. This method is a good place to define how for instance value memoization happens.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface TaskContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the task result
        Parameters:
        task - The task to evaluate
        Returns:
        A value of the task result

        Description copied from interface: TaskContext
        Create a TaskContext.Value with semantics defined by this TaskContext
        Specified by:
        value in interface TaskContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value
        Parameters:
        t - A value value supplier
        Returns:
        A value with added semantics
